name: Da Spot
description: Da Spot serves an all vegetarian menu of fresh health foods from around the globe.

name: Doner Shack
description: Doner Shack is a Mediterranean style restaurant that serves beef/lamb or chicken doner kebabs made on a vertical rotisseries.

name: Dunkin' Donuts
description: Dunkin' Donuts in Paradise Palms Cafe will keep Hawaii running with high-quality beverage offerings–including freshly-brewed Hot and Iced Coffees–paired perfectly with delicious donuts, bakery good, sandwiches and more.

name: Govinda's
description: Govinda's offers a 100% pure vegetarian menu, with items low in cholesterol and mostly organic. They strive to bring you a healthy and delicious meal at the best possible price.

name: Holoholo Grill
description: Holoholo Grill features healthy locally grown salads, sandwiches, poke bowls and grab and go items at affordable prices.

name: Hot Tacos
description: Hot Tacos offers authentic Mexican food, prepped and cooked daily from scratch offering tacos, burritos, and quesadillas with meat options like steak, chicken, marinated pork, and shredded beef.

name: Just Ice
description: Just Ice Hawaii is bringing a simply nice selection of frozen treats to the campus in style. Also on the menu is poke bowls, poke nachos and a variety of paninis.

name: Kamitoku Ramen
description: Kamitoku Ramen specializes in a Tottori-style beef bone ramen with a surplus amount of seasoning to sastisfy all needs .

name: L&L Hawaiian Barbecue
description: Delicious local and Asian-American fusion cuisine served in big portions at reasonable prices!

name: Lasoon
description: Lagoon offers something for everyone with their signature exotic South Indian and Malaysian cuisine.

name: Le Crêpe Café
description: Le Crêpe Café makes traditional French crêpes, cooked to order in front of customers.

name: Ono Seafood
description: Traditional super ono ahi & tako poke; always fresh, premium ahi- never frozen! Made to order poke by the pound & poke bowls.

name: Panda Express
description: Panda Express serves gourmet Chinese food made with only the freshest ingredients.

name: Rocket Coffee
description: Rocket Coffee is blasting off on campus, out to boost your day with a premium selection of caffeinated drinks.

name: Sistah Truck
description: Sistah Truck serves Korean-inspired local cuisine.

name: The Bean Counter
description: Local beans, Local flavor...your Local Coffee Bar.

name: Ba-Le
description: Pastries, sandwiches, and pre-made salads are some of their quick lunch options. Popular items at Ba-Le include pho, pad thai, and banh mi sandwiches.

name: Jamba Juice
description: Jamba Juice blends real fruit and whole ingredients into each delicious fresh juice, smoothie, or energy bowl you order and contains no artificial colors, preservatives, or flavors.
